mapper.select: SELECT * FROM budget_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND book_id = #{bookId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO budget_info ( user_id, book_id, total, category_budgets, period_start_day, annual_total, annual_category_budgets, sync_version, update_time, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{bookId}, #{total}, #{categoryBudgets}, #{periodStartDay}, #{annualTotal}, #{annualCategoryBudgets}, 1, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE budget_info SET total = #{budget.total}, category_budgets = #{budget.categoryBudgets}, period_start_day = #{budget.periodStartDay}, annual_total = #{budget.annualTotal}, annual_category_budgets = #{budget.annualCategoryBudgets}, sync_version = sync_version + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{budget.userId} AND book_id = #{budget.bookId} AND sync_version = #{expectedSyncVersion}
